page.title: 05A DAY IN THE LIFE OF HILARY
page.content: Every day I get up at 7.30 and get dressed.For breakfast I have Harvest Crunch.After breakfast I wash,put my hair up and pack my school bag.I go out to play on my bike .When Sarah Forster comes we walk up to Rebecca's house then set off for school.We start by having assembly,then read.After play we do maths.We eat our dinner at 12.00 and play our games in the play- ground and make pom-poms. In the afternoon we do the Domesday Project or history.After play we carry on or do our own interest work.At 3.30 we walk along the path from school. At home I go out to play until mum calls me for tea.After tea I go out side and hose the garden.Mum calls me in at 8.00 .I watch telvision,go to bed and read a book.
